text:
Local Government (Repeal of By-laws) Order 2005

I, the Administrator in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister Assisting the Premier on Local Government, make the following order under section 154(1)(b) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

22 June 2005

E. C. CRAWFORD

Administrator

By His Excellency's Command,

J. G. COX

Minister Assisting the Premier on Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Repeal of By-laws) Order 2005 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2005.

3. Repeal of by-laws
    The by-laws specified in Schedule 1 to this order are repealed.

SCHEDULE 1 - Repealed by-laws
